title: WTF Riot!!! even more OP unbalanced items
body:
Just look at this shit!!! we CALL FOR DAMAGE NERF's AND YOU GIVE US THIS **%^*%*%*^

replies.body: I think it should be on Summoners rift seems balanced to me
